category_intro_localized.en: A beloved annual tradition returns! Join Perrine and Château Miraval on October 24th for a festive celebration featuring a traditional lighting ceremony, elevated Indian fare and Indian-inspired DJ music.  Tickets now on sale.
category_intro_localized.zh: 我们的户外活动系列继续！ 7月26日加入Perrine和ChâteauMiraval，参加仲夏夜之旅，包括美食，音乐和无尽的MiravalCôtesdeProvenceRosé！门票现已发售。
